overview: Mitch Bishop is in charge of global marketing strategy and execution at DNN, along with the online store, training, community relations and training. Prior to DNN, Mitch spent 7 years as the CMO for iRise, the worldâ€™s leading software visualization company, where he helped grow revenue and the customer base more than tenfold. He has many years of marketing and sales experience building successful software businesses at Scopus, Sybase, Wind River Systems and Ingres. Mitch holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the University of Connecticut. He also has a long history in motor sports and sits on the governing council of the non-profit International Motor Racing Research Center (IMRRC) based in Watkins Glen, NY.
